publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3161 John Swinney: Budget (Scotland) (No. 2) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Budget (Scotland) (No. 2) Bill. Supported by: Alex Salmond*, Bruce Crawford*
